price: (Nyankopͻn) kaa sε: ”Ɛmma saa da. Mo mmienu monfa Yε nsεnkyerεnee nkͻ. Nokorε sε, Yε ka mo ho, Yεte“.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
